definition[0]: to push a knife into someone or something
example[0]: He was stabbed to death in a fight.
example[1]: She had been stabbed in the chest repeatedly.
note[0]: stab somebody in the heart/arm etc
definition[1]: to make quick pushing movements with your finger or something pointed
example[2]: He raised his voice and stabbed the air with his pen.
definition[2]: an act of stabbing or trying to stab someone with a knife
example[5]: He killed him with a stab to the heart.
